name: Books Away
description:
Books Away

This game was made for Godot Wild Jam #27 in 2 days.

How to Play:

Put away the books on the right shelves before the time ends!
Use the mouse and drag on the books to move them! You have to put away the book on the top before grabbing the ones below it.

2 Modes:
  • Timed or Countdown - Time limit, you can choose a random time or set one, the speedrun mode. See how fast you can finish!
  • Stopwatch - No time limit, but the clock counts how much time it takes you to finish.
